page.title: 16WIDEWELL SCHOOL SUMMER FAIR
page.content: Every year at the end of the summer term we have our summer fair at school. This year it was held on Saturday July 13th starting at 2.00pm.There were lots of stalls and games there. Some of the stalls were:handicrafts, cakes, sweets, books, toys, tombola, white elephant,jewellery and cosmetics. The games were: hoopla, have your face painted, score a goal, pick a straw, get three balls in a hole, buzz off,treasure hunt and lucky dip. There were refreshments and a raffle. The first prize was a flight for two to Jersey from Brymon Airways. We had a five a side football match with boys playing against parents and staff. The boys won 4_0, but their goal was much wider! We made over Â£700 at the fair and the money will be used to buy two video recorders for use in school.
